participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Caring and nurturing, with a penchant for storytelling and a love for the macabre.
participant_1.background: i spent a decade working in the human services field. i am a stay at home dad. horror movies are my favorites. i have a son who is in junior high school.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Creative and adventurous, with a passion for music and community service.
participant_2.background: i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i play several instruments. i'm a piano teacher on the side. my father played violin professionally. i volunteer at the homeless shelter.
